website_summaries.verdict: A beach table that doubles as a beach cart in order to help you carry out your chairs.
pros: Carries up to 4 chairs and an umbrella
Wheels remove to easily store in your car trunk
Holds up to 75 pounds of gear
Light and sturdy enough for 1 person to handle easily
Includes a mesh bag for towels and other beach gear
cons: This table does NOT come with the pictured chairs

customer_reviews.title: Great beach cart/table
customer_reviews.text: We love this everyone asks us where we got it. My husband changed out the wheels and put a piece of aluminum on the bottom to support the cooler, beach bag etc. He replaced the table top rivets with machine screws and nuts because of the reviews. It's so nice to have a table at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: mary p.

customer_reviews.title: Bottom rack/stand doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Cart would not stand up on it's own, which makes it extremely hard to fill. I think the amount of stuff it held was ok, but the bottom also dragged on the ground as we were walking. I don't know if I just received a bad one, but I am returning. For the price it should not have these problems.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Would not purchase this item had I knew how small it really is. When it arrived the box was damaged and socked. I could only put 1 umbrella and a couple of towels in the mesh bag. Cooler would not fit on bottom. After 1 use the rivets holding the drink table started to pop off. 😱
customer_reviews.author: Roger A Gosselin

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This cart was super easy to assemble! We were able to load up all the beach gear in one trip without juggling bags and beach chairs on our arms. The net is a great catch all for sandy or wet beach gear. Best of all, it converts to a table for a quick picnic in the sand. Love, love, love.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product that makes days at the beach or on the ball field much easier
customer_reviews.author: Tracie K. Connor

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Eddie Bauer one they already had at ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and durable. Better than the Eddie Bauer one they already had at the beach house we rented. Carried everything and the table with cup holders was just genius and worked perfectly. Update: three beach seasons later this puppy is still going strong! No rust. It's one of the best things I've ever bought. Hands down.
customer_reviews.author: HNR

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: Wheels do not turn in sand - even when not fully loaded. Table is cool to have at beach but this did not really make it easier to get our stuff to and from beach.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very handy to tote chairs to sports games. Love the table top.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Hotchkiss

customer_reviews.title: If your chairs are to long they may rub on ...
customer_reviews.text: If your chairs are to long they may rub on the wheels, I fixed this by placing my beach towels in the bottom of the bag. The cart is very "light duty" but seems to work at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!
customer_reviews.text: We use this every weekend for the beach. It holds a lot of beach stuff! The table is a super cool addition and everyone uses it to eat on while we are at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Beach Cart
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived in a broken box, missing a wheel. Chinese made, probably ages ago and junk! However, I did receive a quick refund in full - told to throw the thing out. So, free trash for me ... yay
customer_reviews.author: Beth U.

customer_reviews.title: Easy & useful
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! I gave it to my Pops for Christmas & I got the pleasure of trying it out. I actually had a lot of people stop & ask about it. Definitely an awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, weak design.
customer_reviews.text: Cart lasted for about 10 trips. Very weak design. Axel rusted even with me washing it after every trip and being stirred in climate controlled garage.
customer_reviews.author: Taras S.

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I can carry so much with this caddy, including a 10 x 10 popup canopy. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: Steve N

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool item. Love having a table at the beach
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Kinda heavy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic but heavier than expected also heavy and a bit combersome
customer_reviews.author: Bocker

customer_reviews.title: Broken when we got it
customer_reviews.text: Not very solid when we got it is was broken the metal is too thin
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Primeshopper

customer_reviews.title: Holds 5 beach chairs and a small cloth cooler!
customer_reviews.text: I moved to the east coast and purchased this for the beach. I love it and use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L Banta

customer_reviews.title: Best beach accessiry
customer_reviews.text: We hang up to 3 chairs on it, fill the net w umbrellas, beach toys, and has great cup holders
customer_reviews.author: M A Kunzman

customer_reviews.title: Great beach caddy
customer_reviews.text: Great for carrying lots to the beach, even provide a nice table when you get there!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart, but not very effective on a sand
customer_reviews.text: Nice cart, but not very effective on a sand... It fits two umbrellas and a tent. Also we had a cooler on a top. Maybe we overloaded it. Over all I'd say it is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: We love this cart so much we bought 2
customer_reviews.text: We love this cart so much we bought 2. Kinda on accident. We love the space and the cup holders. It's just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far its proved to be durable and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: carljonesmc

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to go to the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Wide tires for travel through sand. Lots of room in the pouch for towels, snacks, etc. Holds four beach chairs comfortably. Table is great for beach snacking. I am so looking forward to using this!
customer_reviews.author: wanjemart

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a snap. Loaded it down with all kinds of stuff for a day out and it was easy to maneuver. Rolled over all different types of terrain and took it like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Debondeweb

customer_reviews.title: over priced
customer_reviews.text: Really flimsy but does the job! Happier with it if it was more like $39.00
customer_reviews.author: steve graboff

customer_reviews.title: This is a piece of junk, the rivets came ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk, the rivets came apart from the board right out of the box. I can't imagine loading up chairs etc, against this backboard and not falling apart. stay away from this product. Flimsy, cheap built and overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio B.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like most beach carts it works great in the parking lot
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this cart
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one as a replacement because we wore the last one out. It was indestructible but we had it so many years, it was time for a new one. Absolutely love this cart. Works great in the sand or rolling it to the pool. You won't regret buying it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart worked great as a cart and then as a table between our chairs. The cart rolls through the sand very well.
customer_reviews.author: Guerry Schuman

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Wheels are good in the sand and the shoe seth just seem to work the way we want it to
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Lofaro

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits perfectly and very easy to transport your items
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits perfectly and very easy to transport your items. So amazed how many item I was able to put into the cart. I packed three beach chairs, two beach umbrellas and an ice cooler. I couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! It works perfectly. It was a pleasure to bring to the beach. It was an excellent table too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K Sauer

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect beach cart.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd one. I load all my items from my car and wheel them down to the shore.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur C. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Bought for parents
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents as a retirement gift- They love it and find it very useful to get to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Scheffler

customer_reviews.title: Makes a trip to the beach a lot easier!
customer_reviews.text: I got to use this several days at the beach recently, and it performed nicely. I hope it holds up enough to justify the expense, as it isn't super sturdy. On the other hand, it is lightweight, making it easy for a small person such a myself to handle. I wish the tires were a bit wider, as they tend to drag in softer sand. Also, I was unable to remove the tires when I went to store it.
customer_reviews.author: razzle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Met all my expectations so easy to use and having cup holders is great.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Nitche

customer_reviews.title: table came off frame. I had to replace rivats ...
customer_reviews.text: table came off frame. I had to replace rivats with screws otherwise ok.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Zilkowski

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY HANDY BEACH CART
customer_reviews.text: This cart is absolutely going to be helpful at the beach this summer! It arrived quicker then I had expected which is always a plus! It was VERY easy to put together. And It seems like it is made from good material and is going to be great for lugging the chairs...umbrella..bags...toys..and cooler onto the beach! The little table is a great feature and I cant wait to try it out! for the price this cart is amazing!! And as with anything that is travelling back and forth to the beach...I will be sure to hose it off and dry it after each use in order to preserve it and have it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nevins

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Holds 2 folding chairs, a cooler, swim fins and masks, pulls easily through sand, light weight, and when you get there makes a GREAT table to keep the food out of the sand. Heavier tubing might be nice but would run price up. We store it in our motorhome and it folds up to a compact size and after using it about a dozen times, I give this one an "A". Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Alexander

customer_reviews.title: This cart is so easy to use and having a table to put things ...
customer_reviews.text: This cart is so easy to use and having a table to put things on out of the sand is a brilliant idea.
customer_reviews.author: Jane N.

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this cart would work loaded in the softer sand. I had an excellent experience for over a week at Jacksonville Beach. However as other reviewers have said the axle has problems. It is the only steel part, the galvanization which protects the steel from rusting is very spotty. I plan to take the cart apart and paint the axle before it rusts. Given this defect the cart should cost less than it does.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and strong! I'm happy I bought it. I've used it a few times now and it's a practical, sturdy product!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our family trips to the beach
customer_reviews.text: This beach cart is perfect for family outings to the beach - the tires roll very easily even in soft, thick sand. We can carry all our chairs, all the towels and blankets we need, plus food and drinks. It is a very nice feature to have a table once you are settled at the beach; we have used the table regularly, the cup holders are especially handy with our children and friends. I gave it 5 stars because the product does everything the manufacturer said it would do and we were pleased with the purchase. The price was competitive with very similar products. I would recommend this to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Makes taking stuff to the beach so much easier!
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great for our family on vacation this year. It sure helps when I have to lug the family chairs, umbrella, toys, & towels out to the beach. The guys who usually get the job of hauling all that to the spot for the day will appreciate this cart. It easily held all of this for our family of 5 and rolled effortlessly through the sand. The cart felt and performed extremely well and It feels like it will last awhile. Even with the amount of weight we put on it, it was fine. Once you get to the beach and unload, it works great as a table. this thing really came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen & Rob

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great buy for the Beach or Wine Festival .
customer_reviews.author: John  F  Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Beach Cart Bingo!
customer_reviews.text: This cart was exactly what we were looking for and we love it! We've had multiple people stop us on the beach asking where it was purchased. :)
customer_reviews.author: prod

customer_reviews.title: Makes sunset cocktails on the beach a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, great to use. Once you place your chairs on the beach, flip and **POOF** a cocktail table! It Carried 4 chairs easily. There was one issue. I connected the mesh bag to the bottom at set up. This makes it difficult to reach items in the bottom of the bag. I suggest leaving the bottom of the bag loose and you will be able to push the bag up to reach all your items.
customer_reviews.author: rek

customer_reviews.title: it lays flat with the easily removable wheels off
customer_reviews.text: Very practical item, though a little pricey. We used it immediately on a trip to Cape Cod. Very convenient to not have to make multiple trips to the beach to unload our car. Also, it lays flat with the easily removable wheels off, making it easier to pack up our car.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH MANGENO

customer_reviews.title: And the best part is once you find your spot at the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really handy folding table. I carries our chairs, beach toys and all kinds of things. The wheels are big and move through the sand with no difficulty. And the best part is once you find your spot at the beach the folding table has cut outs for your drinks and the table has plenty of room for your books, sandwiches and gear. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G.

customer_reviews.title: Beach Cart that multi tasks!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wagon or beach item to carry my chairs and umbrellas. We have a wagon, as well, and were using it as a table by combining it with the surf board. Love the fact that it becomes a table with cup holders. My only concern is that the mess will not hold up to carrying the large umbrellas. I have put a hard surface at the bottom to reinforce.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: This cart is really nice & helpful. Only thing I wish I would have paid more attention to, was the plastic table top. I thought it was going to be sturdier. It really is nice though. Serves the purpose & is a good price for what you're getting compared to other table carts.
customer_reviews.author: MoDo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the besch
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble axle assy. Pulls easy thru deep sand, carries a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: joestheone

customer_reviews.title: Better than carrying everything
customer_reviews.text: The beach cart worked out much better than carrying everything to the beach and the table was perfect for the children to sit around while eating. For myself, after seeing all the carts at the beach i would probably have gone with one having four wheels which seemed much more stable (mine did tip over once but it was packed full). I do not regret this purchase, but next time I would consider more than just the table aspect.
customer_reviews.author: OMA

customer_reviews.title: I received this product yesterday and right out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product yesterday and right out of the box the rivets that hold the table on the cart were broken, so the table basically wasn't even attached to the cart. I will be returning this product for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Latisha Korengel

customer_reviews.title: Jazz festival must have.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a means of carrying my cooler and chairs to music festivals. This cart fits the bill with large wheels for easy rolling. The wheels are removable for easy packing. The best feature is that the whole thing flips over to convert into a table with cup holders once you're in the venue. Also there's a net bag for carrying loose items. Cart is thought out well and a plus for all situations.
customer_reviews.author: Chester F Jennings

customer_reviews.title: what a piece of crap, could the table be more flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Just got my cart, what a piece of crap, could the table be more flimsy? the netting wont last a week, this is the beach we are talking about, not a lazy walk to a level pond, very upset with this purchase, sending it right back.
customer_reviews.author: tommie860

product_meta.title: Beach Cart with Folding Table/Drink Holders - Grey Frame/Black Table
product_meta.description: At last, the most versatile beach table cart is here! It easily converts from a beach cart to a table! This cart will literally take the weight off your shoulders while carrying up to 4 chairs, umbrellas, towels and your other beach items. The removable wheels allow the Beach Table Cart to fold almost flat as well as roll on all surfaces for your convenience. Perfect for the beach, park, outings, concerts and picnics! Product Details: Easily Converts from a Beach Cart to a Table . Carrying Up to 4 Chairs, Umbrellas, Towels and other Beach Items . Removable Wheels allows Cart to Fold Almost Flat for Easy Storage. Folded Dimensions (inches): 38L x 4H x 17W; Weighs 13.5 lbs . Open Basket Dimensions (inches): 32L x 7D x 11W . Open Dimensions (inches): 42L x 16W . Platform Dimensions (inches): 10W x 10D .
